content: its new position in the centre of the flap #cozysportysocks page 4 of 5 marie-elyse dugal designs now begin the gusset decreases set-up round knit to last 2 stitches on heel needle ssk work the instep switch to heel needle k2tog knit to end of round 2 stitches decreased round 1 knit to last 3 stitches on heel needle k2tog k1 work instep stitches k1 ssk knit to end of round 2 stitches decreased round 2 knit to end of heel stitches work instep stitches knit to end of round repeat rounds 1 & 2 until 28 32 36 stitches remain on heel needle for a total of 56 64 72 stitches per round foot keep working in ribbing pattern until foot measures 1 5 1 75 2 inches / 4 4 5 5 cm less than desired length work 1 last round as follows k2tog knit to end this will ensure you are now back to 28 32 36 sts on the instep cut mc toes switch to cc2 set-up remove bor marker knit to end pm at the beginning of the instep stitches as the new bor round 1 k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches of instep needle k2tog k1 repeat on sole needle 4 stitches decreased 2 per needle round 2 knit to end of round repeat these 2 rounds until 24 stitches remain per round 12 stitches on each needle graft remaining stitches together using the kitchener stitch second sock follow instructions as for first sock but inverse cc1 and cc2 for the stripes and toes as per sample *don t forget to wet block your new socks for the best fit and for the pattern to settle in place and look its best happy knitting *this pattern is for personal use only no individual may appropriate its content for commercial purposes without the author s consent thank you for encouraging independent designers i would love to see your finished socks on instagram please don t forget to tag me @marieelysedugal #cozysportysocks #cozysportysocks page 5 of 5 marie-elyse dugal designs
